scripts.init-app: pm2 start lan-hub/index.js --name jarvis && pm2 logs jarvis
scripts.init-proxy: pm2 start internet-proxy/proxytunnel.cjs --name jarvis-proxy && pm2 logs jarvis-proxy
scripts.app: pm2 stop jarvis && pm2 flush && pm2 start lan-hub/index.js --name jarvis && pm2 logs jarvis
scripts.proxy: pm2 stop jarvis-proxy && pm2 flush && pm2 start internet-proxy/proxytunnel.cjs --name jarvis-proxy && pm2 logs jarvis-proxy
scripts.restart-app: pm2 stop jarvis && pm2 start lan-hub/index.js --name jarvis
scripts.restart-proxy: pm2 stop jarvis-proxy && pm2 start internet-proxy/proxytunnel.cjs --name jarvis-proxy
